description:
Ninjas, genies, and a kidnapping, oh my! With his friends and Akubi, Kan reluctantly visits a new ninja theme park on invitation from his wealthy classmate Kaneamari. Surprises soon strike: Kan is recruited for a ninja show, then someone disappears.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ninja vs Mahou Tsukai! no Hanashi
忍者vs魔法使い! の話
